title: Ep. 12: 'The Watch'
description:
On today's episode Andy and Chris pay tribute to the life and music of David Bowie. Then they discuss the drunken Golden Globes (26:00), and break down the career of Denzel Washington (36:00).
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
